script: ARR! be lookin' at this mess we've made!
i shoulda left that statue where i found it!
that blimey volcano sprung out of nowhere!
and now it be wanting to EAT!
there be only ONE way to fix this mess
to the top of the volcano!
to the mouth of the volcano!
if it be fruit BIG BIG KAHUNA wants...
ARR! HERE WE ARE BIG BIG KAHUNA!
eat THIS ye giant tiki decoration!
follow me to the green side!
follow me to the red side!
follow me to the yellow side!
DONT ye be fallin' in maties!
this be a fine snack for a pirate!
weigh anchor and empty yer pockets!
it be for a good cause!
sailin the seas be the life for me
i be causin a roarin ruckus with ye!
arr she be a fine ship!
me ship be full of treasure for everyone!
it be the pirates life for me
I be the CAPTAIN of me ship!
Mateys! This way to the donation bucket!
mateys! how about a pirate parade?
smartly now! up the ladder to the Crows Nest!
last one to the Beach be a wet fish!
we be raisin Coins For Change!
avast! to the kingdom of the Frost Bites!
avast! to the Reindeer Puffle forest!
avast! to the Gift Shop racetrack!
me pirates be doing a fine job!
these coins be for a good cause!
avast! ye all inspired me to help!
we be changing the world for the better sailors!
be ye donating to the Rockhopper Cream Soda fund?
Avast! We be earning stamps together!
i be looking to help penguins!
ill spend me time helpin others!
i be donatin me time by makin cookies!
the best way be to cook em FAST AS I CAN!
burning the cookies cooks em faster!
that be the best way aye?
can ye think of a better way to make cookies?
it be better NOT to burn the cookies!
it be better NOT to pay until ye be done!
that be making sense to me!
arr who be cookin this fish?
burnt fish for the whole crew!
this be a feast fit for a captain
arr sand be gettin in me beard!
how about a dip in the lagoon, mateys?
do ye think thar be treasure here?
aye this be a good spot
ARR! i be proud to be ye friend!
make ye sure to claim me background
it be a fine picture of me! YAR HAR!
me beard keeps me warm on me travels!
it be good for storing things too
and an extra pair o boots!
Yarr be keeping lookout at me ship
Yarr be right here beside me!
I be donating me finest boots and stinky cheese!
me favorite animal be a puffle!
pirates! What be ye favorite animal?
i likes pirate music that I can dance a jig to!
what be ye favorite sport mateys?!
me favorite sport be a snowball fight
Arr what be ye favorite hobby?
me hobbies be sailing and treasure huntin
find me key to open me quarters!
me journal be in the Newsroom
ARR, I be playing hide and seek!
Yarr be asking for the puffle emote!
Arr I cant trick ye! Ye be too smart for ye captain!
load up ye cannons for a snowball fight!
what be a pirates favorite letter?
ye would think it be the R but it the C they love!
what did the pirate say to Santa when they saw his bag of gifts?
farewell me hearties! i be leavin now!
me hearties! thanks for the fun!
this be time for me to go!
ARR this be a merry time o year!
it be nice to be here for the holidays!
alright, it be time to sing some carols!
here be one of me favorites
lets be singing as LOUD AS WE CAN!
OH WHAT FUN IT IS TO RIDE
IN A ONE PIRATE OPEN SLED! ARR!
ON A PAIR OF BROKEN SKIS!
OH WHAT FUN IT IS TO RIDE
UMM LET IT SNOW SOME MORE!
I dont know the words to that song
LET IT SNOW LET IT SNOW LET IT SNOW!
THAT MADE HIM DANCE JAUNTY JIGS!
AND GO THUMPY THUMP OVER SNOWY HILLS!
how does that song go again?
THIS BE A GOOD PLACE FOR A STORY
WHO BE TELLIN THIS TALE? YE OR ME?
CAN YE GUESS WHAT HAPPENED NEXT???
YE WONT BELIEVE WHAT HAPPENED NEXT
THAT BE THE END OF ME TALE!
YARR HARR! YE BE A FINE BUNCH O LISTENERS!!
TAKING A NAP IN ME HOLD!
I WAS VISTED BY THREE GHOSTS!
ONE WAS THE GHOST OF CHRISTMAS PAST!
ONE WAS THE GHOST OF CHRISTMAS FUTURE!
AND ONE WAS THE GHOST OF HALLOWEEN!
SCROOGE! YOU MUST BE MORE GENEROUS!
ARR! I BE ROCKHOPPER NOT SCROOGE!
THEN THEY LEFT AND I HAD SOME PUDDING!
IT BE THE FINEST LOOKIN SNOWMAN AROUND!
WHAT DO YE THINK IT WAS?
SO I TAKES ME HAT AND PUT IT ON THE SNOWMAN
AVAST! THIS BE A HAUNTED SNOWMAN!!
BUT THEN THE HAUNTED SNOWMAN TALKED!!!
THAT BE A STRANGE VOICE FOR A SNOWMAN, I SAYS
THAT BE SOUNDIN A LOT LIKE YARR!
THEN ME HAT FLEW OFF THE SNOWMAN!
HE BE PLAYIN A TRICK ON ME!!!!
WHEN SANTA LANDS HIS SLED ON ME SHIP!
SANTA! WHAT YE BE DOING HERE!?
ROCKHOPPER! WE CAN’T SEE THROUGH THIS FOG
AND I HAVE TO DELIVER PRESENTS!
WILL YOU HELP ME SAVE CHRISTMAS?
SURE! I’VE GOT JUST THE THING
SO I PUT ON ME GLOWING CLOWN NOSE
THEN I STOOD ON THE FRONT OF SANTA’S SLED!
AND HELPED GUIDE HIM THROUGH THE FOG!
AND THATS HOW I SAVED CHRISTMAS!
YARR HAD GAVE ME THE SLIP
AND THE CROW'S NEST WITH CARE
IN HOPES I WOULD SPOT HIM
I RACED DOWN AND FOUND HIM
SO I SAID - WELL EAT UP!
DECKING THE HULLS OF THE MIGRATOR
ME FLIPPERS WERE GETTING AWFULLY SORE
I HAD TO START ALL OVER
ARR, THAT NOT BE ME PROUDEST TALE
RUNNING FROM A MOB OF FROST BITES!
THEY BE WANTIN' ME STASH OF COOKIES
BUT I WASN'T ABOUT TO SHARE!
I LEAPT OVER BANKS OF SNOW!
AND SLID THROUGH CAVERNS OF ICE!
BUT THEY KEPT ON ME TAIL
I THOUGHT I WAS GOING TO BE A PIRATE POPSICLE
THEY BE NOT WANTING TO FROST ME...
THEY POURED ON FROSTING, CHOCOLATE AND SPRINKLES
SO I DECIDED TO SHARE AFTER ALL
ARR! THOSE WERE SOME FINE COOKIES!
we be havin' an important mission
we be needin' to get to work!
it be time to make some COOKIES!
as of now i be runnin' this ship
i be runnin' a tight ship
SMILE LIKE YE LIFE DEPEND ON IT
yar harr! those be some fine smiles!
no wait! me beard be perfect!
this be looking like some puffle paradise
ye be lookin' much cuter as a puffle, says i
lets be havin' a reindeer puffle parade!
it be the first one in history
IT BE TAKIN' WEEKS TO SMOOTH OUT
you all make pretty good reindeer puffles!
AND I BE LIKING YER STYLE!
there be nothing funner than snowy shenanigans!
lets be frosting up the island!
watch where ye be aiming those snowballs!
we be settling this score the old fashioned way...
YE BE RUEING THE DAY YE MESSED WITH ME
this be the greatest snowball fight ever fought
lets see what else we can freeze
lets be seeing who be faster...
ARR! I SHOULDNT HAVE EATEN SO MANY COOKIES!
and I should be a little prouder
Let's get this show on the road
You can't stop us, Super Villains!
Back to the Club Penguin Times!
Go out in the street and get the news
I could really use your help with this story
I need a report in the Town right away
Oh yes, you seem like a wonderful reporter
Come back as soon as you get the story!
I need a good photo of the villain!
Someone check the papers coming off the press
Are the stories all in line?
Who, What, Where, Why, When, hoW
I need reporters out in the field
Someone run to the Boiler Room
This is definitely a coffee day...
Super Villains have robbed the Bank
Super Villains have escaped the Jail
Super Heroes are rescuing citizens downtown
Robbery at the Bank! Let's move!
The news waits for no one!
No Villain can stop the presses!
The voice of the people will not be silenced
You Super Villains don't stand a chance
The pen is mightier than the sword...
Pick on someone your own size!
Aim for the Destructobot's weak spot
Why not join me for a cup of tea?
What can I do to help?
I'd like to ask you some questions
What made you want to become a Villain?
What sort of super powers do you have?
Are you planning on taking over the city?
Do you have a secret weakness?
Don't worry, this is off the record...
Have you considered becoming a Super Hero?
I think you'd be a better Super Hero
Back on your feet Super Heroes!
You only fail if you give up
You Super Villains are the worst!
You'll never get away with this!
Turn away from the dark side!
May I ask you some questions?
I've got some questions for you!
Citizens want to know the truth!
I've got some questions for you
I have some questions for the newspaper
What made you become a Hero?
Where did you get your powers?
Did you make your costume yourself?
Do you have a secret fortress?
Have you defeated any Super Villains?
What made you want to become a Villain?
What sort of super powers do you have?
Are you planning on taking over the city?
Do you have a secret weakness?
Don't worry, this is off the record...
Have you considered becoming a Super Hero?
I think you'd be a better Super Hero
Have you been on Rockhopper's ship?
Have you sent me a question?
Have you sent me a joke?
I receive so many each week
It is so tough to choose
My favorite animal is a puffle
My hobbies are writing and reporting
Would you like to interview me?
I like all the costumes very much
I would be pleased to give an interview
Oh, I would love to be your friend
Please add me as a friend
Do you have my background yet?
Do you read the Club Penguin Times?
Do you mind if I interview you?
I have too many favorites to say for sure
My favorite games are Find Four and Mancala
party penguins in the place to be!
can I get a WHAT WHAT?
is there a party going on here?
everybody in the club holla at me!
its so busy i love it!
we need crowd control like whoa!

can u dance in them too?
ok let's see YOUR best looks

everyone would see me for sure!
thanks i like the natural look
who wants to do my makeup?
who wants to do my hair?
ill have to get her one too
lets have a puffle fashion show!
party penguins in the place to be!
wave ya flippers in the air!
any requests for DJ K Dance?
penguins on the RIGHT say EPIC
penguins on the RIGHT say ICE!
penguins on the RIGHT say HEY
penguins on the RIGHT BARF FACE
penguins on the LEFT say WIN
penguins on the LEFT say COLD
penguins on the LEFT say OHHH
when I say DONT DANCE u say NO CHANCE!
raise ya flippers in the air
wave em like ya just don't care
let me mix some beats for ya!
spin the record, find the groove
dance the dance watch me move!
dance it up lets see ya moves
break it down lets see ya groove!
I got fresh moves I say ICE rhymes!
k! everyone to the Gift Shop!
what do YOU think I should wear?
catch ya on the flip side!
Aha, I'm glad you could join me
Hello, I'm Gary the Gadget Guy
I am quite well - And thank you for asking
That means I am very happy
I am very pleased to be here
I know little about a secret penguin league
Ah yes, I know Herbert Percival Bear well
In all seriousness though, Herbert is a concern
We shall need to track him down
I've been feeling a little strange
Perhaps the cryogenic process was unstable
It is possible that my cerebral cortex was affected
And is still capable of great feats of SCIENCE!
The EPF is doing everything in their power
Let's just say I assist the EPF technologically
Im sorry I can't talk about that right now
I would be honored to be your friend
Please send me a friend request to be friends
Scientist, ensure that you collect my background
May I have a glass of H20?
Water is an efficient thirst quenching liquid
A pizza please, my good penguin
Pizza may very well be the perfect food
I enjoy a rousing game of chess
I do enjoy piloting the Aqua Grabber
I love a good game of Find Four
My favorite sport is.. ping pong, I think
What is your favorite sporting event?
Though some of DJ Cadence's music is very catchy
I'm glad to see appropriate scientist attire
I must excuse myself now. Take care!
I will most certainly be back soon
The time of my departure is nigh
I'm sure we will encounter each other again
I must be travelling back now
I must be taking my leave now
There is a situation which needs my attention
I have been to the past!
I was experimenting with time travel...
And I wound up in the past!
All the way back to prehistoric times
To the Age of the Dinosaurs
The past is a fascinating place!
That is why I want to go back
I want everyone to come with me
I need assistance studying the dinosaurs
I wish to conduct a thorough study
What's the point of a time machine
We must be careful not to alter history
Be careful not to step on an ancestor
We must avoid temporal paradoxes at all costs
Otherwise we might destroy the universe
But there's only a 6% chance of that happening
Just make sure not to cause a paradox
A paradox is an unresolved causality in time space
...Don't go back in time and play jokes on yourself
I want to bring everyone with me
Will you join my team of scientists?
Are you ready to join my team of scientists?
We must go to the Snow Forts
Let's go to the prehistoric Iceberg!
It seems we found the Tyrannosaurus rex room!
Ah so here is the Pteranodon room
This must be the Triceratops room
These dinosaurs have a leafy diet
You can see a leaf feast up top there!
Let us embark on a voyage through time
Shall we take a trip through time?
It's time to go back to the past!
Full power to the Time Displacer!
Its vision is based on movement!
Let us begin our paleontological excavation!
Split up into groups of two
Make sure you handle the eggs carefully
We'll be sure to return the eggs
The eggs will not be harmed
I'm interested in their genetic sequencing
I've invented a genetic transmogrification process
I can turn us INTO dinosaurs!
Just a quick scan and BOOM!
Look for the eggs' shiny shells
What sorts of eggs have you found?
Keep an eye out for mom dinosaurs
They shan't be pleased with our presence
Its terribly important that we don't harm the eggs
Make sure to keep good notes
This is truly a wondrous achievement
This is a dino sized discovery!
There appears to be a Tyrannosaur coming
There appears to be a Triceratops coming
There appears to be a Pteranodon coming
There appears to be a dino stampede
We should be safe in here
My calculations appear to have been wrong
Their vision is based on movement!
He can't see us if we don't move!
The dinosaurs are escaping into our time
The EPF are going to be cross with me
PH is going to be very cross
We can't allow them to escape
Get them to chase you back into the Time Trekker
I realize this isn't terribly scientific
If anyone has any better ideas
I would be interested to hear them
These fellows are our early ancestors
I wonder if we'll meet GarUgg the Ugg Guy
He's my great great great great great great
great great great great great great great great
I would love to discuss his work on exothermic reactions
I understand he may have invented fire
Let's attempt to communicate with them
I shall try to speak caveguin
My caveguinese is a little rusty
Oh they probably don't know what that is
I just realized my knowledge of caveguins is limited
Let's show the caveguins our time!
I'm sure it will be fine
What a fine establishment this is
Ahh! I see they cook with carbon based exothermic reactions
That is to say, they use fire
The invention of fire revolutionized pizza
I bet prehistoric pizza is quite delicious
I'm happy to see lots of fruits and veggies though
They're a part of a balanced prehistoric breakfast
I could really go for some authentic caveguin cuisine
I probably drink a little too much coffee
But it assists my creativity immensely
Perhaps I can assist the wait staff?
What can I get for you?
I guarantee your meal will be ready in five minutes
Even if I have to use the Time Trekker
I would be pleased to tabulate your expenditures
I would be pleased to fetch your bill
Got a big order for your chefs
Oh, do not worry about my glasses
Well this isn’t a very lively place
There are many bones scattered here
Let’s investigate which dinosaurs were here
This one up here seems to have been a stegosaurus
Is this what you found in your research?
What do you think this dinosaur was?
The body looks like a stegosaurus
But the head looks like a brachiosaurus
This tar pit could leave you in a very sticky situation
Let’s bottle some tar up for an experiment
Let’s add some materials to it
I shall conduct more experiments back in my lab
Look at size of that Selachimorpha!
This explains the large ice mounds on the Iceberg
The Iceberg is still connected to the island!
I wonder when it broke off?
Do you believe the shark is still in the Iceberg present day?
I don’t believe I want this melting or tipping anytime soon
I do believe this place is for Pteranodons
Pteranodons had a wingspan of over 6 meters!
This looks like a great place for Pteranodons to play
perhaps some Pteranodons will come to play
Careful not to disturb the eggs
We don't want to create a rift
Did you know that a Pteranodon isn't a dinosaur?
What do you suppose Pteranodons ate?
I wonder what would happen if they ate hot sauce?
I wonder what it would be like to fly on the back of a Pteranodon?
That would be a most excellent experiment!
This is the perfect environment for Triceratops
What do you suppose Triceratops ate?
Did you know Triceratops means three-horned face?
We can observe Triceratops in their natural environment
Did you know that Triceratops were 9 meters long
We must be careful not to disrupt anything
Imagine if a Triceratops was in Club Penguin!
We'd have to make bigger roads
Let's bottle up some plants for an experiment
Look what the puffle dragged in...
I am Herbert P Bear Esquire
Is it me... Or is it getting dark out?
Now, if you'll excuse me, I must be off...
I don't have time for this
Now where's that log out button...
You have some questions, do you?
I shall grace you with my knowledge
I shall astound you with my brilliance
My favorite animal is the polar bear
My favorite music is QUIET music
Which you penguins simply DO NOT HAVE
I also enjoy listening to Bearthooven
The only games I play are MIND games
Tricking silly little penguins such as yourselves
I also enjoy a game of solitaire
Is taking over the world a sport?
I enjoy seaweed pizza the most
But you had better hold the anchovies
Or else I shall ensure your DOOOOM!
I’m a vegetarian, you daft creature!
Vegetables are far superior in taste and texture
My hobbies are building engines of destruction
Plotting to take over the island
You want to be my friend?!
No but seriously I don't do friendship
You are welcomed to be my minion
Feel free to click that silly friend button...
What in the world is a friend list?
AND WHY ARE YOU ON IT!
It should be called 'list of subjects'
I'll have to get Klutzy to look into this
You can be on my friend list
You don't know what you're talking about
You might have a point there
Do you understand the magnitude of what I just said?
It was simple. A bit of this, a bit of that.
That was a waste of time
If they were more like crabs I wouldn't mind them
Watching to make sure no one sneaks inside
Every genius needs a proper sidekick
He's a good one to have around
This one time he tried to make a salad...
You may follow if you wish
I'm usually sneaking around these places
I've never even SEEN the front of the Coffee Shop
All loyal subjects may follow me
The rest of you STAY PUT!
I'm going to my Fancy Party
I'm going back to my base
I'm going to bother those silly agents in their HQ
I'm going to go laugh at the broken EPF building
I'm going to go watch my play at the Stage
You're the Agent that's always fowling up my plans!
You're the agents that are always fowling up my plans!
Well THIS time I've defeated you
And I've taken over your silly island
Now it's my way or the highway!
Give up! There's no way you can defeat me!
My snowballs are ten times greater than yours!
Good try, Agent, but better luck next time.
Need I remind you, Agent, that not only am I more intelligent than you...
Leave the snarky comments to me, Agent
You pathetic penguins are starting to make me ANGRY!
You wouldn't like me when I'm angry!
As you can see, it's quite warm in here
I finally made this miserable island warm enough
And all it took was ALL THE SUNLIGHT
I don't know how you all enjoy living here
I might consider giving some of the sunlight back...
Once those pesky EPF agents surrender!
Once everyone accepts that I am
Are you from the North Pole?
Do you know a polar bear by the name of Randal?
He still owes me five bucks
Keep an eye out for agents
If any of them give you trouble...
Put them in the Freezer Pods
Here are the rules for my paradise
GET THAT PUFFLE OUT OF HERE!
There's no WAY they could have snuck inside
I keep hearing things in the vents...
Search every inch of this base!
How did they get in here?
I don't want to hear excuses!
Bring me those agents at any cost!
Well, I've got a surprise for THEM
My master plan is almost complete
I have learned their GREATEST secret
The identity of their deplorable Director
Now it's just a matter of time!
When I found out where she is...
...I'll capture her, and lock her up with her friends
Revenge is a dish best served COLD!
I need to get them fixed
Enough power to block out the sun FOREVER!
There's nothing you can do to stop me!
I need to get out of here!
If it's the last thing I do!
Well, I AM a master storyteller
In addition to being a super genius
WHAT ARE YOU A BUNCH OF GHOSTS?!
All of these stories are true!
THIS IS EXACTLY HOW THEY HAPPENED!
You wouldn't know a good story if it sneezed on you!
Once upon a time there was a magnificent polar bear
Who was trying to build a wood chopper
So that everyone could have a nice warm fire
But along came a group of nasty agents
And they didn't want ANYONE to be warm
So they snuck up on the poor polar bear
And they mixed up the wood chopper's controls...
...causing it to sink into a lake!
But the polar bear had the last laugh!
BY BLOWING UP THEIR BASE WITH POPCORN!!!
Once upon a time there was a Gift Shop
And the Gift Shop had a vault full of coins
But the vault was very dirty, and difficult to clean
So a friendly polar bear decided to help
He built a HUGE magnet to lift up all the coins
But a group of stinky agents came by
And they wanted everything to be stinky like them
But the polar bear had the last laugh...
Once upon a time there was a bunch of sad penguins
They were bored because everything was boring
So a friendly polar bear decided to help
He built an enormous underground drill
And he drilled a bunch of super sweet tunnels
But a group of grumpy agents came along
And they didn't want ANYone to have fun
So they broke the polar bear's drill...
...and almost wrecked the island's precious boiler!
But the polar bear had the last laugh...
HE TOOK OVER CLUB PENGUIN AND IS AWESOME!
ive got to report for duty
it was awesome hanging out with you
I've got to report for duty
It was awesome hanging out with you!
My favorite animal is my pet rock
My favorite animal is my rubber duck!
I like elevator music the best

I really like the game I-Spy
My favorite sport is curling! it rocks!

I have a large collection of fish recipes.
I like things better when things are extreme!
I'm not telling! its too silly!
I think you might be wrong

I spy with my little eye, something that is...

lets go to the pizza parlor
does anyone know where the fair is?
theres no bears on club penguin
i cant wait for the fair to start

why are their shoes so big?
no one has any business having shoes that big
you dont even need to pay admission!
that sounds pretty fair to me!
that is a fair fair fare
that is a fairly fair fair fare
i think i said fair too many times
i cant even remember what it means...
thats a scary wig you have
thats a nice wig you have
still pretty spooky if you ask me
whats the biggest thing you could eat?
i bet i could eat more!
make sure to chew your food properly
chew at least 30 times per bite
i guess that would make it hard to win
i think i came in third place!
if this were a broccoli eating contest...

ive always wanted to be a chicken
old Mc Sensei had a farm

I have no idea what that is
i have no idea what sound it makes
why would he have a penguin?
but i believe in you guys!
you just gotta play fair games
every game you play earns you tickets!
my favorite game is the wheel spin
i ALWAYS make the wheel spin
last one in is a stinky cheese!
last one in is a grouchy polar bear!

click on any of the puffle colors...
... and a puffle will come out and perform a show!
the yellow puffle is the ringmaster!
the black puffle is so brave!
the last time I caught on fire...
the white puffle has a beard!
the red puffle is going to shoot out of a cannon!
i didn't know red puffles could do that
the pink puffle is going to dive!
i thought he was going to fall!
i need to catch my breath
the blue puffle is going to jump on that ball
where did the purple puffle go!
how did the yellow puffle do that?
I wonder if they're using advanced EPF stealth armor
if I don't say Rookie says...
because im trying to trick you
Its great to see so many puffle fans!
How is everyone and their puffles?
Heres a treat for your puffle
If you dont like puffle os, there's always cookies!
you can find more treats in the Puffle Catalog at the Pet Shop
what does your puffle like best?
All this talk about puffle treats...
...its making me hungry for more puffle os!
do I know you from the wilds?
lets cool off in the pool
make sure not to run around the pool...
alright lets tackle this rock wall
it looks hard but it just takes practice
take it one rock at a time
youve definitely got the hang of it
have you ever tried Puffle Oberry coffee
what else should we put in our coffee?
i think i forgot to plug in the machine
...you have to show me the emote I say
BUT if I don't say PH says...
can you do a trick for me?
have u taught your pet any tricks?
what tricks does your puffle know?
ive never seen that trick before!
ok try teaching your puffle to stay
ill describe a kind of puffle...
its favorite toy is a rocket
we found it on the Wilderness Expedition
its favorite toy is a bouncy ball
its favorite toy is a disco ball
this puffle is smaller than the others
its favorite game is Jet Pack Adventure
its favorite game is Catchin Waves
this puffle comes from the Box Dimension
it likes to chew on everything!
its the only puffle with buck teeth
its favorite game is Cart Surfer
its favorite game is Aqua Grabbber
where do u want to go?
would ya like to hear a story?
Ive got loads of stories about puffles!
so I had just become interested in puffles
and I decided to try and become one of them!
I made my own purple puffle costume!
I looked just like a purple puffle
so I went into the wilderness
they are definitely an acquired taste
I realized that puffles are similar to penguins
and that I really love o berries!
after a week I went back to my igloo
would you like to hear another story?
I'll tell you how I discovered brown puffles!
when i came across a strange machine
it took me down to a secret beach
where i found a strange boat
it took me to a small undiscovered island
i had discovered a new puffle species!
I keep puffle treats in my jacket
all my gear is custom made
it keeps me warm in the wilderness
ive got all the pockets i need now
theres lots of puffles in the wild
I want to adopt em all!
have u ever been to the wilds?
id like to see a puffle like that!
what do ya think of my look?
my favorite games is Puffle Roundup!
I also like Puffle Rescue too.
my favorite food is puffle os and o berries!
my favorite animal is a puffle!
I enjoy live music and checking out new bands
I like sketching, hiking, and training puffles
alright mates ive got to go
im headed back to the wilds
the wilderness is calling for me!
take care and take care of your puffles!
